attributes.additional_details: It seems unfair that the tax payer foots the bill as a result of covid 19. The current government is due to raise the taxes this march at the same time as giving MP's another pay rise. A reduction in their annual salary to £50,000 is fair and more than enough to live on in addition to their MP allowances. Lets see "we are all in this together" in action.
attributes.background: Reduce MP's annual salary untill our economy has recovered from the effects of covid 19

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
